md:
giải nghĩa từ "rescued" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Rescue (verb) - Cứu, cứu thoát
	+ Meaning: to save someone or something from a dangerous or difficult situation
	+ Example: The firefighters rescued the people from the burning building.
	+ Related words: save, liberate, deliver, extricate
	+ Antonyms: abandon, forsake, neglect

* Rescue (noun) - Cuộc cứu thoát
	+ Meaning: an act of saving someone or something from a dangerous or difficult situation
	+ Example: The rescue of the stranded hikers was a heroic effort.
	+ Related words: salvation, liberation, delivery, extraction
	+ Antonyms: abandonment, desertion, neglect

Note: The verb "rescue" can also be used in a more general sense to mean to retrieve or recover something, such as a lost item or a failing business.
